email.title: Macquarie Technology Insight Programme - 9th October
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Macquarie have changed the dates for their Technology Insight Programme and are accepting applications until the **30th of September**. If you are interested in learning more about the company and get an early start for Macquarie's 2020 Technology Internship or Graduate Programmes, check the details below!

Didn't secure an internship this summer or looking to change roles? Start your internship search for next year with this two-day event in Macquarie's London offices!
Macquarie are looking for driven and talented students to join their 2019 Insight Programme on the 9th of October! Explore the company's career opportunities in Technology by taking part in skill-based workshops and case studies that reflect the varied roles at Macquarie.\ Accommodation and meals will be catered for.
**Applications close on the 30th of September!**\ [Click here to apply!](http://www.careers.macquarie.com/cw/en/job/941586/2019-macquarie-technology-insight-programme-emea)
Note that this event is aimed at students on track for a 2:1 or equivalent who are in their: - first year of a 3 year course; - second year of a 4 year course; - penultimate or final year of their degree.
This opportunity is not open to PhD, MBA or experienced hire candidates.
